questions.question: sore throat
questions.answer:
A natural remedy for a sore throat is honey mixed with warm water. Honey has antimicrobial
 properties that can help soothe a sore throat.

questions.question: headache
questions.answer:
To relieve a headache naturally, you can use peppermint oil. Applying diluted peppermint oil to
 your temples can provide relief from headaches.

questions.question: indigestion
questions.answer: Ginger tea is a natural remedy for indigestion. Ginger helps stimulate digestion and can reduce nausea and bloating

questions.question: improve sleep
questions.answer:
Drinking chamomile tea before bed can help improve sleep. Chamomile has calming effects that
 can promote better sleep

questions.question: boost the immune system
questions.answer:
Consuming garlic regularly can help boost the immune system. Garlic has antibacterial and
 antiviral properties that support immune health.

questions.question: reduce stress
questions.answer:
Practicing deep breathing exercises can help reduce stress naturally. Deep breathing can calm
 the nervous system and reduce stress levels

questions.question: acne
questions.answer:
Applying tea tree oil to acne-prone areas can help reduce acne. Tea tree oil has antibacterial
 properties that can help clear up acne.

questions.question: cold
questions.answer:
Drinking elderberry syrup can help treat a cold naturally. Elderberry has antiviral properties that
 can help reduce the severity and duration of a cold

questions.question: muscle pain
questions.answer:
Applying arnica gel to sore muscles can help relieve muscle pain. Arnica has anti-inflammatory
 properties that can reduce pain and swelling

questions.question: improve digestion
questions.answer:
Consuming probiotics such as yogurt or kefir can help improve digestion. Probiotics support a
 healthy gut flora and aid in digestion.
